===Usage===
* specifies a constant expression on template parameters that [[cpp/language/requires|evaluate a requirement]]
:* within such a requirement, introduces a [[cpp/language/requires#Nested_requirements|nested requirement]]
* in a template declaration, specifies an [[cpp/language/constraints | associated constraint]]
